text: Enrique Olivera (9 February 1940 â€“ 4 November 2014) was an Argentine politician. He served as Chief of Government of the City of Buenos Aires from December 1999 to August 2000. Olivera died in Buenos Aires on 4 November 2014, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Mayors of Buenos Aires
